content: pattern consists of 1 size reference however this pattern can easily be adjusted to any size ranging from adult large/ adult medium/ teen/ kid toddler/ infant/ newborn / preemie use chart included as a reference guide when making the beanie for any size increase or reduce the length and width according to your size and preference yarn weight category 4 brand red heart super saver color royal and black hook 5 00 mm gauge 9 row x 12 8 alpine st = 4 x 4 / 10 x 10 cm no yarns yardage 198/ 169/ 152/ 129 108/ 94/ 81/ 41 tools tapestry needle measuring tape scissors stitch markers skill advance beginner free pattern available
